name: fixtures_by_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_pro.
Tool description: -SportMonks API- Looking for better and reliable Football Data? More Leagues(1.000+)? Faster Livescores (>15 faster)? And more available Odds and Stats? Check https://sportmonks.com/football-api  With this SportMonks Football Pro API we offer 900+ Leagues and the fastest real-time Livescores in the market with a rich set of other features like (live)Odds, Statistics, Line-ups, Standings and many more features. For example our Livescores are often faster than TV and often >15 seconds(!!) faste...
API description: The Fixture endpoint provides information about Games in particular Leagues. With this endpoint you can get the fixtures by Date. | Popular includes: localTeam,visitorTeam,events

date.description: The date for which to retrieve fixtures and results, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to '2023-02-04' if not provided.
